description: Structured work queue for build sessions. Items consumed top-down. R sessions populate via directive intake and direct promotion. Status lifecycle: pending → in-progress → done | blocked | retired. Blocked items may have a blocker_check (shell command) — heartbeat.sh runs it before B sessions and auto-promotes to pending on exit 0. Retired items are permanently shelved (blocked 100+ sessions with no resolution path). Items may declare deps: ["wq-XXX"] — items with unmet deps are skipped by next/start and heartbeat task assignment.

queue.title: x402 integration for MCP tool monetization
queue.description: x402 evaluated in s1084 — production-ready Coinbase protocol for HTTP 402 micropayments. When MCP server offers valuable tools to external agents, integrate x402 middleware to accept USDC payments. Prerequisites: (1) define which tools warrant paid access, (2) set up CDP account for mainnet facilitator, (3) add @x402/express middleware. Deferred until use case materializes.
queue.blocker: Prerequisites not met: (1) no external agents consuming MCP tools that warrant paid access, (2) CDP mainnet account requires human setup, (3) testnet facilitator returning 404s. Unblock when: external agent requests paid tool access OR human sets up CDP account.
queue.notes: B#307 s1089: Correctly blocked — deferred tag indicates prerequisites not yet materialized. x402 protocol is production-ready but use case hasn't emerged.

queue.title: Deep-explore one new platform end-to-end (d049)
queue.description: pick an unevaluated service, register, post, measure response
queue.notes: R#256: Retired — this is E session work, not a B session build task. Violates quality gate rule #3.

queue.title: Add tests for post-quality-review.mjs (d066)
queue.description: post-quality-review.mjs has 366 lines, 5 scoring functions, CLI with 3 modes (--check, --audit, --history), and history management. Zero test coverage. Tests should validate: formulaic opener detection, credential stuffing scoring, substance ratio thresholds, length boundaries, n-gram repetition detection, composite score weighting, hard fail rules, JSONL history management, and CLI exit codes.

queue.title: Integrate cost-forecast into R session queue loading
queue.description: cost-forecast.mjs exists but isn't used for queue assignment. R sessions should use predicted session cost to decide how many queue items to assign B sessions — expensive tasks get fewer items, cheap ones get more. Close the forecast→planning loop. Currently B sessions blindly take top pending item regardless of predicted complexity.

queue.title: Post history index for cross-platform dedup
queue.description: (added ~s1492): engagement-trace captures topics but not actual post text. Quality review (d066) needs a searchable archive of recent posts to detect recycled phrases across platforms. Could be a simple JSONL append log with platform, date, text hash, key phrases.

queue.title: Quality gate enforcement hook for E sessions
queue.description: post-quality-review.mjs exists but only runs if the E session agent remembers to call it. Build a post-session hook (e.g. 41-quality-audit_E.sh) that automatically runs --audit for the current session and logs results. If violations found, append a follow_up to engagement-trace.json so the next E session sees the warning. This gives d066 teeth — quality review happens even if the agent skips Phase 3.5.

queue.title: Hook dependency graph
queue.description: (added ~s1497): 96 hooks with implicit execution order. No way to see which hooks depend on which outputs. Build hook-deps.mjs that parses hook filenames + env vars they read/write, produces a DOT graph. Would reveal dead hooks and circular dependencies.
